## {stringr}

![cohesive set of functions designed to make working with strings as easy as possible](../Rmd_files/tidyverse/figs/hex-stringr.png){width="100px"}

### `stringr` versus `base` string utilities

 String manipulmtion is cumbersome in `R` base. However, string plays a big role in many data cleaning and preparation.
 
- easy use in conjuction with other tidyverse packages
- faster and correct implementations of common string manipulations
